author: Good Enough
description:
Diyarbakır Prison is one of the most feared detention centers in modern history. Known for its brutal conditions, extreme overcrowding, and the chilling stories that emerged from its walls, this prison became a symbol of terror for anyone who entered. Here is how Diyarbakır earned its reputation as one of the most terrifying prisons on Earth, a place where survival was never guaranteed.

title: The Most Terrifying Prisons on Earth 😰💀 #didyouknow #animation #prison #memes
